document_data.name: Swordpoint
document_data.mainbody: '''Swordpoint''', or '''The Swordpoint''', was a huge needle-shaped mountain in the [[Anauroch]] desert.
document_data.Geography: The tall Swordpoint mountain was far taller than any of the other peaks in its range. It was even far taller than the neighbouring mountains of the [[Plain of Standing Stones]], such as those of the [[Snout Mountains]] and those close to the [[Dark Bones Rift]].{{Cite interactive atlas}} Around the base of the mountain were several water-filled sinkholes.
document_data.History: In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], manticores were known to live around the mountain, drinking at its many natural wells.
